item.title: Spanish-English Storytime
item.description:
Pleasant Hill Branch - All ages storytime which uses both English and Spanish to present books, rhymes and songs. It differs from a traditional bilingual storytime in that some material is presented in English while other material is presented in Spanish, allowing for a natural transition between stories and activities and exposing children to both languages in an inviting environment. Program length can vary.
Esta hora del cuento es para niños y niñas desde bebitos hasta de edad escolar y para sus padres. Se presentarán libros, rimas, y canciones en inglés y en español. Difiere de un programa tradicionalmente bilingüe en que el material no va a ser traducido de un idioma al otro, sino que presentaremos algunas cosas en inglés y otras en español empapando a los niños en los dos idiomas. De esta manera ellos se sentirán cómodos usando los dos idiomas. Recomendado para niños y niñas menores de 5 años.

item.title: *CANCELED* Meet the Shelter Dogs of Austin Animal Center
item.description:
Menchaca Road Branch - Foster dogs will be available for adoption. You can also learn about other animals available for adoption at AAC and how you can support animal rescue in Travis County.
The following items are needed to help animals in the shelter and the community. Items can be dropped off at Austin Animal Center anytime or at the Menchaca Road Branch Library during the month of July:
Dog/cat treats Washable, durable pet toys Bedding – blankets and sheets (please no comforters, electric blankets, or pillows) Newspaper New and gently used collars, harnesses, and leashes New and gently used carriers and crates

item.title: Controversy & Conversation – Theaters of War
item.description:
Terrazas Branch - Come view a screening of the 2022 documentary “Theaters of War.”
“A documentary about the U.S. military's editorial control over thousands of Hollywood's films and television programs.”*
After the film there will be a group discussion lead by this month's discussant, Hart Viges, a member of Veterans for Peace and Director of Sustainable Options for Youth.
2023 marks the 10th anniversary of Controversy & Conversation, a film series program partnership between UT's Humanities Institute and Austin Public Library's Terrazas Branch.
* (from the official documentary website)
** (discussant is TBA)

item.title: Canceled - Cuentos en español
item.description:
North Village Branch - Storytime in Spanish or presented bilingually in Spanish and English / Una hora de cuentos bilingües o en español para toda la familia
Program length can vary. Programs begin on time, for best experience we recommend you do too! Please arrive a few minutes early to gain entrance. Note that in some locations, free tickets (available in the branch on the day of the program) will be required for admittance. Contact individual branches to arrange group visits of 5 or more children to storytimes.
Recomendado para niños y niñas menores de 5 años. Recomendamos que llegue a tiempo, ya que las horas de cuentos comienzan precisamente a la hora programada. Para asegurar tener asiento, por favor llegue unos cuantos minutos antes del comienzo. En algunos locales se requiere tener boleto para entrar (lo puede obtener gratuitamente el mimso día del programa en la sucursal). Llame a la sucursal para hacer arreglos para traer grupos de 5 niños o más a la hora de cuentos.

https://austin.bibliocommons.com/v2/record/S67C2090633
Feel free to join even if you've read any other biography/documentary, or just want to have conversations about Prince.
Virtual event

Registration for this event will close on 07/23/23.

Los programas de Cuentos introducen a los niños a libros, rimas, música y otras actividades divertidas. La Biblioteca Pública de Austin ofrece programas que coinciden con los niveles de desarrollo y la capacidad de atención típica de niños de diferentes edades.
La mayoría de los programas se presentarán en inglés, pero pueden ser disfrutados por personas que hablan otras lenguas.

item.description:
Online Event - This is a dual language storytime for children aged 5 and under and their caregivers, featuring stories, songs, fingerplays, rhymes, and other pre-literacy skill building activities in both English and Japanese.
Some material is presented in English while other material is presented in Japanese, allowing for a natural transition between stories and activities and exposing children to both languages in an inviting environment. Storytime lasts about 30 minutes.

item.title: Early Literacy Play
item.description: Carver Branch - Playing is learning! Play is a great way to help develop and reinforce early literacy skills. This come-and-go program is designed to give caregivers and their children time to explore together. Toys, board books, and a weekly craft will be provided.
item.dc:creator: Austin Public Library Events

item.title: Canceled - Dual Language Spanish English Storytime
item.description:
Milwood Branch - All ages storytime which uses both English and Spanish to present books, rhymes and songs. It differs from a traditional bilingual storytime in that some material is presented in English while other material is presented in Spanish, allowing for a natural transition between stories and activities and exposing children to both languages in an inviting environment. Program length can vary.
Esta hora del cuento es para niños y niñas desde bebitos hasta de edad escolar y para sus padres. Se presentarán libros, rimas, y canciones en inglés y en español. Difiere de un programa tradicionalmente bilingüe en que el material no va a ser traducido de un idioma al otro, sino que presentaremos algunas cosas en inglés y otras en español empapando a los niños en los dos idiomas. De esta manera ellos se sentirán cómodos usando los dos idiomas. Recomendado para niños y niñas menores de 5 años.
item.dc:creator: Austin Public Library Events

item.description: Ruiz Branch - BizAid Orientation provides a general overview on how to open a small business or re-imagine an existing one. BizAid Orientation is free and open to the public, but space is limited so you must register.

item.title: Spanish-English Storytime
item.description:
Windsor Park Branch - All ages storytime which uses both English and Spanish to present books, rhymes and songs. It differs from a traditional bilingual storytime in that some material is presented in English while other material is presented in Spanish, allowing for a natural transition between stories and activities and exposing children to both languages in an inviting environment. Program length can vary.
Esta hora del cuento es para niños y niñas desde bebitos hasta de edad escolar y para sus padres. Se presentarán libros, rimas, y canciones en inglés y en español. Difiere de un programa tradicionalmente bilingüe en que el material no va a ser traducido de un idioma al otro, sino que presentaremos algunas cosas en inglés y otras en español empapando a los niños en los dos idiomas. De esta manera ellos se sentirán cómodos usando los dos idiomas. Recomendado para niños y niñas menores de 5 años.
item.dc:creator: Austin Public Library Events
